description: Our team of experienced veterinarians is dedicated to providing compassionate and high-quality care for your pets. Get to know the experts who make your petâ€™s health their top priority.

veterinarians.name: Dr. Sarah Mitchell
veterinarians.bio: Dr. Mitchell has over 15 years of experience treating dogs and cats. She is passionate about preventive care and promoting healthy lifestyles for pets.
veterinarians.education: DVM, Cornell University College of Veterinary Medicine

veterinarians.name: Dr. Emily Rodriguez
veterinarians.bio: Dr. Rodriguez helps pet owners design balanced meal plans that support long-term health and prevent obesity-related illnesses.

veterinarians.name: Dr. Michael Lee
veterinarians.bio: Dr. Lee provides expert care for exotic pets, focusing on habitat enrichment, nutrition, and disease prevention.
